I myself main Yorick and Renekton im only m6 with them and m7 with Mundo but dont really play top as much as i used to as these days jglers just seem to focus top so much cuz of the op champs in it so im back in the jg but id have to say yorick is my main and prob my best champ a good yorick player can turn an entire teamfight around with a good ult and good build keeping him alive and peeling

I disagree with Darius, Yi, Tryn and Garen, but the others are really high skillcap champions. A really good Katarina brings alot to the table compared to a bad Katarina. A good Zed compared to a bad, the same.
How is Katarina high skillcap?

There's alot you can do with her if you're good. Whether you instantly wardjump after killing someone in the middle of a grouped fight to safety, or dodge skillshots, or choose when to engage ect. ect. I have 150k on her so I'm biased ofc. She has a few build paths (Got M7 with AD tank kat lmao). She's alot harder I hear at Higher ELO, so that stuff becomes more relevant as it goes up. She has the sort of kit where lots of little things can make a difference depending on you and your opponents. Low skillfloor, really high skillcap.
Ahh ok, well i haven't really played Kat, so i don't have much experience playing her, just vsing her.
I can tell you first hand as an experienced Katarina player that she takes more than it looks like.

bad katarina player - stays in lane

good katarina player - roams bot frequently in the first 20 minutes of the game.

of course if you are in bronze that bot lane roam generally ends up in katarina *almost* getting a kill on the support only to die to tower.
